content.en: Splice junction analysis: A set of algorithms have been developed to accurately analyze RNA sequencing data and detect splice junctions, which are important for understanding gene expression and alternative splicing. These algorithms, such as MapSplice, SpliceMap, and HMMSplicer, are highly accurate and efficient in identifying splice junctions, even for novel ones. They provide valuable insights into alternative splicing events and potential functional changes resulting from splice variation.
content.da: Splice junction analyse: Et sæt algoritmer er blevet udviklet til nøjagtigt at analysere RNA-sekventeringsdata og opdage splice junctions, som er vigtige for at forstå genekspression og alternativ splejsning. Disse algoritmer, som MapSplice, SpliceMap og HMMSplicer, er meget nøjagtige og effektive til at identificere splice junctions, selv for nye. De giver værdifulde indsigter i alternative splejsningsbegivenheder og potentielle funktionelle ændringer som følge af splice variation.
